Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Oracle Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-21498, CVSS 6.5
chapter.text: An unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Database Server related to the Java VM component could allow an authenticated attacker to cause no confidentiality impact, high integrity impact, and no availability impact.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Oracle Vulnerabilities

chapter.title: CVE-2022-21497, CVSS 8.1
chapter.text: An unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Web Services Manager related to the Web Services Security component could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause high confidentiality impact, high integrity impact, and no availability impact.
